problem_names:
lemma real_of_rat_ineq: assumes "real_of_rat x \<le> z"
  shows "x \<le> of_int \<lceil>z\<rceil>"
translations:
lemma real_of_rat_ineq: assumes "real_of_rat x \<le> z"
  shows "x \<le> of_int \<lceil>z\<rceil>"

proof (state)
this:
  z \<le> real_of_int \<lceil>z\<rceil>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<le> rat_of_int \<lceil>z\<rceil>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  real_of_rat x \<le> real_of_int \<lceil>z\<rceil>

proof (prove)
using this:
  real_of_rat x \<le> real_of_int \<lceil>z\<rceil>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. real_of_rat x \<le> real_of_rat (rat_of_int \<lceil>z\<rceil>)

proof (state)
this:
  real_of_rat x \<le> real_of_rat (rat_of_int \<lceil>z\<rceil>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<le> rat_of_int \<lceil>z\<rceil>

proof (prove)
using this:
  real_of_rat x \<le> real_of_rat (rat_of_int \<lceil>z\<rceil>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<le> rat_of_int \<lceil>z\<rceil>

proof (prove)
using this:
  real_of_rat x \<le> real_of_rat (rat_of_int \<lceil>z\<rceil>)
  (of_rat ?r \<le> of_rat ?s) = (?r \<le> ?s)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<le> rat_of_int \<lceil>z\<rceil>

proof (state)
this:
  x \<le> rat_of_int \<lceil>z\<rceil>

goal:
No subgoals!

definition real_of_rat :: "rat \<Rightarrow> real" where
  "real_of_rat x = of_rat x"
by (intro_classes, auto simp: real_of_rat_def of_rat_add of_rat_mult real_of_rat_ineq)
abbreviation mat_real ("mat\<^sub>\<real>") where "mat\<^sub>\<real> \<equiv> map_mat (real_of :: 'a :: real_embedding \<Rightarrow> real)"
